comments: Sends a ping to FusionAuth indicating that the user was automatically logged into an application. When using
FusionAuth's SSO or your own, you should call this if the user is already logged in centrally, but accesses an
application where they no longer have a session. This helps correctly track login counts, times and helps with

params.name: userId
comments: The Id of the user that was logged in.

params.name: applicationId
comments: The Id of the application that they logged into.

params.name: callerIPAddress
comments: (Optional) The IP address of the end-user that is logging in. If a null value is provided
the IP address will be that of the client or last proxy that sent the request.
